items.description: Grilled strips of chicken breast, curry, served with delicious peanut sauce and cucumber salad.
Served with peanut sauce and cucumber salad.
Ground fillet of fish mixed with Thai curry served with sweet sour sauce topped with pieces of cucumberand crunched peanut..
A luscious blend of shrimp and deep fried till crispy.
Deep fried shrimp wrapped with spring roll skin.
Fresh spring roll stuffed with cooked bean curd, bean sprout, cucumber, omelet and topped withtamarind sauce.
Fresh rolls with mixed vegetables, noodles, splashed with our house dressing. Served with peanut sauce.
Home-made egg rolls stuffed with bean thread noodles, carrots, and cabbage. Served with sweet & sour sauce
Tiny egg rolls filled with chicken, shrimp, black mushroom and bean thread noodle. Served with sweet & sour sauce
A mixture of crab meat, cream cheese, celery and homemade sauce, wrapped in thin crepes and deep fried till crispy. Served with sweet & soursauce
Steamed shrimp or fried shrimp dumpling. Served with special homemade sauce.
Wheat flour pastries filled with a luscious blend of shrimp and garden vegetables. Served with homemade sesame sauce.
Deep-fried flesh bean curds. Served with sweet & sour sauce topped with ground peanuts and onion.
Crispy shrimp served with lime sauce.
Pot stickers (3), Crab Rangoon (3), baby Egg Roll (3), Shrimp Roll (3) and Fried tofu.
Octopus Ball with Japanese barbeque sauce, mayo, bonito flakes.

soups.description: chicken noodle soup with bean sprouts and chinese broccoli.
Served with peanut sauce and cucumber salad.
bean curd cakes and assorted vegetables in clear broth.
clear soup with shrimp and chicken stuffed won ton and napa.

noodles.description: stir-fried thin rice noodles with bean sprouts, green onion, egg, ground peanuts (on the side) and sliced lime. your choice of chicken or tofu.
stir-fried egg noodles with chicken, egg, carrot, zucchini, straw mushrooms and broccoli.
stuffed shrimp dumpling, chinese broccoli, bean sprouts, egg noodles and bbq pork. served in clear broth.
tasty egg noodles with bean sprouts and crushed peanut. your choice of chicken, tofu, beef or vegetables.

entrees.description: stir-fried ground chicken or beef with sweet basil leaves, bell peppers, onions, carrot and jalapenos. spicy.
stir-fried garden vegetable with your choice of chicken, beef, tofu or plain vegetables in gravy sauce and garlic.
your choice of chicken, beef, tofu or vegetables with onions, egg, green peas, carrots and a touch of lime.
stir-fried boneless chicken breast with roasted cashew nuts, onion, pineapples, bell peppers, carrots and dried hot pepper. spicy.
